description: This down-filled jacket features a reversible design that offers the choice of wool-and-cashmere flannel or sleek oxford.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 27" body length (front and back), a 20" shoulder, a 46½" chest, and a 36" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 1" between sizes.
Two front waist zip pockets at each side.
Shell: leather "Polo Ralph Lauren" shield patch with our signature Pony at the left sleeve.
750 fill power. Fill power measures the loft of the down and ranges from 450 to 1,000 for apparel.
Shell: 94% wool, 6% cashmere. Reverse: 100% polyester. Ribbed trim: 83% wool, 16% nylon, 1% elastane. Fill: 90% white duck down, 10% white duck feathers. Exclusive of decoration. Dry clean. Imported.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size medium.
